title: Ticket #1066: TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER only available in <SUBSYS>_ form
description: condor_daemon_client/daemon.cpp params for TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER, but only does so for a specific subsystem, e.g. SUBMIT_TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER or TOOL_TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER. It does not allow for a naked TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER or for the proper <SUBSYSTEM>.TIMEOUT_MULTIPLIER syntax.
remarks:
